name: AP_CLAIM_ICIV_RSN
description: The table lists the reasons a claim is marked as not clinically valid for derivation in I CLM 18619.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ICIV_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the reasons that I CLM 18619 is set to No.
